archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1114
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to see a history of how many payments I have made on time and potentially be rewarded for this, so that I am motivated to continue paying on time

properties.value: SC: As far as I understood all the payments are going to be automatic, and service would be stopped in case of failure in payment (subscription failed to renew) - what do you mean by paying on time? Currently no loyalty cababilities related wth number of on-time payments.
